Reader.Name: tab_column3_count
tab_column5_count
tab_column3_4_count

tab_column4_sum
tab_column4_4_sum
tab_column6_sum
Reader.Sql:
SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.`payDate`,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='01' AND (pp.finishDate is null ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" or DATE_FORMAT(pp.finishDate ,'%Y') >DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ) ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
Reader.Description:
SELECT SUM((IFNULL(pp.loadSum,0)-IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)-IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0))) AS guarantySum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.`payDate`,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='01' AND (pp.finishDate is null ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" or DATE_FORMAT(pp.finishDate ,'%Y') >DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ) ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.reportDate,'%Y')<DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}

Reader.Sql: SELECT COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS pcount, SUM(pp.`loadSum`) AS psum FROM pro_project pp WHERE 1=1 and pp.busiClass = '01' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`reportDate`,'%Y-%m')='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
Reader.Description: SELECT COUNT(pp.project_ID) AS pcount, SUM(pp.`loadSum`) AS psum FROM pro_project pp WHERE 1=1 and pp.busiClass = '01' ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.`reportDate`,'%Y-%m')='"+endyearmonthsql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}

Reader.Name: tab_column4_3_freesum
tab_column6_3_freesum
Reader.Sql:
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS FfreeSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='01' AND pp.finishDate is null -- ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.finishDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
Reader.Description:
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(tab1.payCapitalSum,0)+IFNULL(tab2.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS FfreeSum FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pfp.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pfp.payCapitalSum,0)) AS payCapitalSum FROM pro_factpay pfp WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pfp.payDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pfp.project_ID )tab1 ON tab1.project_ID = pp.project_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
pre.project_ID, SUM(IFNULL(pre.replaceCapitalSum,0)) AS replaceCapitalSum FROM pro_replace pre WHERE 1=1
${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pre.replaceDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} GROUP BY pre.project_ID )tab2 ON tab2.project_ID = pp.project_ID where 1=1 and pp.busiClass='01' AND pp.finishDate is null -- ${has(endyearmonthsql)?(" and DATE_FORMAT(pp.finishDate,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT('"+(endyearmonthsql+'-'+'0'+'1')+"','%Y')"):""} ${has(wheresql)?(" and wheresql='"+wheresql+"'"):""} ${has(dataJurisdictionSql)?(dataJurisdictionSql):""}
